name: lightTribeDocs
description: Swagger-UI static pages for LightTribe REST interface

scripts.docs:updateAPI: git checkout develop -- api/swagger.json && git add -A && git commit -m 'Update swagger.json from develop branch using npm script'
scripts.docs: npm run docs:updateAPI && npm run docs:publish
scripts.updateSwagger: rm -rf ./node_modules/swagger-ui && npm install swagger-ui && cp -r ./node_modules/swagger-ui/dist/* . && git add -A && git commit -m 'Updated swagger-ui for docs using npm script'
